title: Day 309 (Matthew 23, Luke 20-21) - Year 4

description:
SHOW NOTES: 

- All the info you need to START is on our website! Seriously, go there. - Join our PATREON community for bonus perks!

- Get your TBR merch

FROM TODAY’S PODCAST: 

- Deuteronomy 11:18

- Numbers 15:37-41

- Matthew 9:20

- Image: Phylactery

- Image: Fringe

- 1 Corinthians 6:3

- Visit The Bible Recap Store!

- Subscribe to The Pour Over

DISCLAIMER: The Bible Recap, Tara-Leigh Cobble, and affiliates are not a church, pastor, spiritual authority, or counseling service. Listeners and viewers consume this content on a voluntary basis and assume all responsibility for the resulting consequences and impact.
